import styled from 'styled-components'; import myinfobanner from '../../img/myinfocf.png'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../../css/personalInfo.css'; import sidebarimage from '../../img/sidebarimage.png'; import axios from 'axios'; import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; /*sidebar 디자인을 위한 css*/ export const banner = styled.div` margin-left: 50px; `; export const showtopic = styled.div` margin-left: 5%; margin-top: 5%; `; export const showMoreorder2 = styled.div` margin-left: 10%; color: white; background: orange; padding: 0.375rem 0.75rem; border: 1px solid lightgray; border-radius: 0.25rem; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5; `; export const btn4 = styled.div` color: white; background: #d3d3d3; padding: 0.375rem 0.75rem; border: 1px solid gray; border-radius: 0.25rem; font-size: 1.5rem; width: 26%; line-height: 1.5; `; function Orderlist({match}){ const [product, setProduct] = useState([]); const i = match.params.id; //주소 (work/detail/:id) 중 id 값 받아온 것 useEffect(() => { axios .get(`/api/t/w/me/order/payment`) // .then((result) => console.log(result.data.response)); .then((result) => setProduct(result.data.response)); }, []); if (product.length > 0){ return(
